title: Weather shows correct local current conditions but can't get tomorrow's or 10 day forecasts anymore.
content: Installed all updates since issue began. Multiple reboots. Sent feedback in multiple areas, Chrome, Launcher, Settings. Stopped and restarted Launcher. Guess I should uninstall updates and reinstall... It's not critical so I don't really want to invest much more time. Guess I took for granted while was working so nicely
